entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
